name: Minute of Rage
description:
Disclaimer

This game is hard. It may cause rage. Also it has won 3rd place in Pixel Day 2017!

Description

Is it possible to escape hell? Try to survive one minute on the deadly arena of suffering and find out.

Controls

You can use keyboard and that's fine. But this game also has gamepad support. You should give it a try!

Version History

1.1 - 09/08/19

Changlelog:

  • decreased player's momentum and falling speed to make controls more tight;
  • adjusted requirements for unlocking items;
  • added fullscreen mode for browser version;
  • reworked main menu;
  • updated web audio compatibility.

1.0.2 - 26/01/17

Changlelog:

  • added gamepad stick controls;
  • fixed window size adjustment in desktop version;
  • fixed minor bug with item positions.

1.0.1 - 23/01/17

Changlelog:

  • fixed equipped locked item bug.

1.0 - 02/01/17
